item.title: **AMBER ALERT** Lookout for these babies, Aurora
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

**AMBER ALERT** Lookout for these babies, Aurora

Missing From: Aurora, CO. Missing Date: Sun, Oct 18 2020. AMBER Alert. An Endangered Missing alert was previously issued. New information has Aurora Police Department concerned that Sabrina and the children may be victims of foul play. Please be on the lookout for them traveling in Sabrina's vehicle...

missingkids.org

Have you seen this child? Demarcus Thomas

item.title: #CALLTOACTION
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#CALLTOACTION

Denver Homeless Out Loud

SNOW is coming...Winter Gear Needed on FRIDAY

Call out for winter gear!! It is gonna be freezing cold and snow on Sunday and Monday. With all the sweeps lately ...many people have lost their gear and have nothing. Proper gear can be a matter of life and death.
Please donate the following to our office ON FRIDAY (10/23) anytime between 9am and 5pm. We will not be in the office on Saturday so please bring it by Friday so it can get to people in need.
(Or give it directly to someone in need.)
-Tents ($25)*
-Tarps ($6)
-Sleeping Bags ($30)
-Blankets ($20)
-Handwarmers ($6)
-Good gloves ($15)

*All prices listed are average price at Walmart. Also you can get these at a thrift store for cheep.

(We do not have storage capacity for clothes, so please only bring winter gear...not lots of clothes - other places will take clothes).

Bring items to the DHOL office (2260 California St Denver CO) THIS Friday 9am to 5pm
Feel free to call us at 720-940-5291
Or give items directly to people on the streets who need these things

Living without a house in the winter requires this protection. Your gifts of gear save people's lives.

Contact:
info@denverhomelessoutloud.org
720-940-5291

See More
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: Jorge Araiza is organizing this fundraiser. Created October 5,...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Jorge Araiza is organizing this fundraiser.
Created October 5, 2020
Accidents & Emergencies
Jorge Araiza has been in sanctuary resisting deportation since December of 2019.

...

He is the father of four U.S.-born children. Jorge has lived in the U.S. for 21 years. He grew up and attended school in Denver, and this is where he formed his family. Practically his entire direct family is in Colorado, including his parents, siblings, and his four children, who need him here with them. It would be a huge loss for his four children to not have their father. The youngest child is four years old, and needs his father.

On September 18 Jorge‚Äôs lawyers abandoned his case and now he urgently needs to find legal representation. The legal costs are very high, and so he‚Äôs hoping to activate the community asking the community for solidarity as it is urgent for him to have legal representation. Being in sanctuary, it‚Äôs difficult to save up $5,000 on work alone. So he‚Äôs asking the community to help keep this father with his four children. They are young, and need him here with them. Jorge is doing everything he can to raise the money through his business detailing cars and doing freelance graphic design. However, it‚Äôs not enough to provide for his family and his legal costs. Moreover, he was taken by surprise at his legal team‚Äôs decision to abandon the case. Help provide him legal counsel so that he can continue fighting his case and stay with his family.

Jorge‚Äôs new lawyer will start with a deep investigation of his legal case, and she needs $2500 to begin. After that we‚Äôll have an estimate of the full legal costs. Right now costs are estimated at $18,000. We‚Äôll update the page once we know that full costs for sure.
https://www.gofundme.com/f/keep-jorge-with-his-family

See MoreJorge Araiza has been in sanctuary resisting deportation since December of 2019. He is the fa‚Ä¶ Jorge Araiza needs your support for keep jorge with his family

gofundme.com

keep jorge with his family, organized by Jorge Araiza

item.title: Our sis and community warrior is being targeted! Please like,...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Our sis and community warrior is being targeted! Please like, comment, share and donate to LadySpeech üñ§
Links in comments

Bianca Mikahn is with Quianna Jakayle and 10 others.

ACTIVATION NEEDED! Please copy & paste, get word everywhere. I never tag folks but this is key

The sistren LadySpeech is being unfairly targeted for speaking tr...uth and light for our community. Her IG following has been completely ERASED after she built it to over 20,000 active followers. She has been placed in FB jail with NO WARNING for 30 days. All without any word before or during. I looked after she told me. Its devastating. She made so much content, had such amazing conversations and connections happening there. Go to her IG now? "No Posts Yet"

Because she works for community. For sex workers. For rachet hood girls. BECAUSE SHE STARED THAT SMUDGING THE COPS BIT. Because she is effective.

Being an activist/actionist/advocate is literally the only source of income for Speech. She serves directly without support of any organization. Her readings (get one!), videos and performances (which of course are on pause) support her endless quest for advanced spiritual practices and insights.

In a world maddened by Blackness, by fatness, by survivors Lady Speech glows and grinds endlessly. Her whole life is on this work. Her outspokenness around dismantling systems of oppression harming Black/Fat/MaGes is specifically why she is experiencing this direct attack.

Ensure Speech's work is able to continue by paying her directly. And often.

Your most valuable community leaders are under specific attack.
SHOW.UP.

CashApp; $LadySpeech
Venmo; @Ladyspeech-Sankofa

See More

item.title: Many many thanks from these two and all of us at #BLM5280 to...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many many thanks from these two and all of us at #BLM5280 to everyone who has donated to support them through their troublesome time! Black mothers with disabilities have almost no safety nets in our current system! When we say #defundthepolice we mean take those billions wasted on mortal combat gear and funnel them back into programs that should be keeping this family afloat. Until that happens we have to continue to show up for each other. It‚Äôs #Disabilityawarenessmonth. Show your support in #mutualaid and #reparations. #Blackmamasmatter
cash app: $shynethegoddezz

(Flyer in comments for sharing to raise awareness!)

item.title: #ENDSARS #ENDSARSNOW #BLACKLIVESMATTER
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#ENDSARS #ENDSARSNOW #BLACKLIVESMATTER

Black Lives Matter Philly

BLACK LIVES MATTER PHILLY STATEMENT OF SOLIDARITY WITH THE #EndSARS MOVEMENT IN NIGERIA AGAINST POLICE BRUTALITY

At Black Lives Matter Philly, we affirm that Al...l Black Lives Matter EVERYWHERE. We stand in solidarity with our family in Nigeria and the #EndSARS movement against police brutality. We fully support the #EndSARS demands for the complete abolition of the Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS) unit of the Nigerian Police Force and an end to all forms of state violence against Nigerian people:

Read our full statement below and at our website: http://www.blmphilly.com/‚Ä¶/statement-of-solidarity-with-th‚Ä¶/

item.title: We are so close to our goal, y'all! Please ‚ù§Ô∏è ,...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

We are so close to our goal, y'all! Please ‚ù§Ô∏è , comment, and share this post because you already know these algorithms won't let us be great! #BlackEducatorsMatter #CallToAction #BlackLivesMatter #Reparations #MutualAid

Black Lives Matter 5280

#CTA #Calltoaction Black afternoon fam and friends! Don't know about y'all, but we are still in our feelings about the lack of Black nominees for #ColoradoTeach...eroftheYear. From your shout outs we put together a list of 32 Black educators in Denver and Aurora that deserve all the props for their #Blackeducatorexcellence! We're excited to share that BLM5280 is pledging to honor their general dopeness with a $50 award to each nominee BUT if we can get 160 of y‚Äôall to give just $10 we can double that and send each educator $100! Send your contribution at the link below and be sure to label it ‚Äò#BlackEducatorsMatter‚Äô.

www.venmo.com/BLM5280

Like, share, and comment 'done!' so this post doesn't get buried! ‚úäüèø‚úäüèø‚úäüèø

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Alliance for Street Health ResponseFor the next two weeks, we will be co-hosting a series of workshops to...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Alliance for Street Health Response

For the next two weeks, we will be co-hosting a series of workshops to build infrastructure and community support in preparation for what may happen during and ...after election day. We join Colorado Jobs with Justice/Trabajos con Justicia and community partners Denver Action Medic Network and National Lawyers Guild of Colorado for these events. Join us on October 21 for a Protest Safety and First Aid workshop: https://fb.me/e/4L16rNdfB

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280BLM 5280 Freedom SchoolOlivia, a current Moonshot fellow, is hosting a Moonshot pilot centered on the use of joy and...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280BLM 5280 Freedom School

Olivia, a current Moonshot fellow, is hosting a Moonshot pilot centered on the use of joy and healing to disrupt systems. It is a co-creation session of listeni...ng, reflecting, and imagining for how joy shows up in our lives and how it could. This is specifically centered on BIPoC youth (ages 12-18) and the demands of how/what is needed to thrive and have joy. Register your child here: https://docs.google.com/‚Ä¶/1FAIpQLSdSj_hvwzGBYjE--W‚Ä¶/viewform

My sister is in need of community. I believe we all have it in us to come together to help her. The system doesn‚Äôt care about a Black woman who is unable to wor...k due to a recently diagnosed chronic illness, or the son she is raising and needs to shelter & feed. Shyne needs our support while she recovers. Anything helps üôèüèΩ $shynethegoddezz

item.title: This weekend, BLM5280 held our Fall Strategic Planning Retreat...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

This weekend, BLM5280 held our Fall Strategic Planning Retreat and we are so excited for all that we are getting ready to bring to the community. Sending gratitude to the 7 (yes, 7!!) Black-owned businesses (6 Black-Woman-Owned!!!) who supported our retreat and gave us the opportunity to support their amazing work.
Thank you to Konjo Ethiopian Food; Urban Sanctuary Denver; Neha of Transformative Leadership for Change; the incredible Hues of Hendrix; Nola Voodoo Tavern; Whittier Cafe, Your Real Estate BFF Millete Birhanemaskel; and Jalisa Williams of Soulflower Yoga for all that you do for community and all that you brought to our retreat.
Forward Together,
BLM5280 üñ§
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: ‚ÄúThe general strike is the most powerful tool the working...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúThe general strike is the most powerful tool the working class has to win political change. With Trump now openly talking about stealing the November election, unions are beginning to talk about a general strike to stop a coup, and defeat the rising tide of fascism here in the US.

But what is a general strike? How do they happen? What can you do to start organizing your coworkers now for mass action? Join our General Strike School this Halloween to find out and get plugged into an organizing network!‚Äù

https://fb.me/e/35D71dbLz

SAT, OCT 31 AT 2:00 PM MDT

General Strike School!

Online EventCauses ¬∑ 128 people

item.title: #DEMANDS...
item.content:encoded:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

item.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
item.content:encoded:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org

Black Lives Matter 5280
